translations.translation: and soaring date-palms with layered spathes,
And tall date-palms with their spathes pile on pile
and tall palm-trees with their thickly-clustered spathes;
and tall palm-trees with clusters of dates
And high date-palms with lush fruit.
And date palms Basiqat, with arranged clusters.
And the tall palm-trees having spadices closely set one above another,
and tall palm-trees with spathes compact,
And lofty date-palms with ranged clusters,
and tall palm-trees with their thickly-clustered dates,
And tall date-palms laden with clusters ranged.
and tall date palms with regularly set spathes,
And tall (and stately) palm-trees, with shoots of fruit-stalks, piled one over another;-
And tall date-palms, with ranged clusters;
and tall palmtrees with compact spathes
And the soaring palm trees, with clustered dates.
And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -
[50:10] and the date-palms that stand tall (bāsiqātin, is an implied [future] circumstantial qualifier) with piled spathes, one [cluster of dates] sitting on top of the other,
(And lofty date-palms with ranged clusters,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ } أي منضودٌ

translations.translation: And His saying, "A rising sun" - that is, a sun that will never set.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَ } أنبتنا به خصوصاً { ٱلنَّخْلَ } وجعلناها { بَاسِقَاتٍ } طوالٍ محتملاتٍ { لَّهَا طَلْعٌ } ثم ذو عنقود { نَّضِيدٌ } [ق: 10] منضود منضدٍ بعضه فوق بعض من كمال كثرته


وإنما أنبتا ما أنبتنا

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ والنَّخْلُ باسقاتٍ } طوالاً في السماء
 أو: حوامل
 من: بسَقت الشاة: إذا حملت
 وتخصيصها بالذكر مع اندراجها في " جنات " لبيان فضلها على سائر الأشجار
 { لها طَلع نَضِيدٌ } منضود
 بعضه فوق بعض
 والمراد: تراكم الطلع
 أو: كثرة ما فيه من الثمر
